com.me.tiledMapGame.pathing

Class ObjectGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.me.tiledMapGame.pathing.ObjectGrid

  • public class ObjectGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains multiple GridLayers and a list of all entities.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGridLayer()
      Creates a new initialized (but empty) GridLayer and adds it to the end of ArrayList<GridLayer> GridLayers.
      void clearAllVisited()
      Calls clearVisited(int li) for all layers in GridLayers.
      void clearVisited(int li)
      Marks all nodes in the grid as unvisited for the layer indicated by li; this MUST be called before running PathFinder.find_path() again.
      boolean createTower(int ti, int li, int x, int y, boolean allLayers)
      Creates a new Tower object at location (x,y) with the properties of the Tower described by Tower towerIndex[ti].
      boolean createUnit(int ui, int x, int y)
      Create a new unit specified by ui (unit_index) at location (x,y); assumes player resources have already been checked and will be augmented elsewhere.
      void removeTower(int li, int x, int y)
      Removes the tower located at (x,y) from the ObjectGrid's entity list.
      boolean spawnEnemy(int ei, int x, int y)
      Create a new Enemy specified by ei (enemy_index) at location (x,y).
      void update()
      Calls the update method for all Towers, Units, and Enemies.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Calls the update method for all Towers, Units, and Enemies.

      • addGridLayer

        public void addGridLayer()
        Creates a new initialized (but empty) GridLayer and adds it to the end of ArrayList<GridLayer> GridLayers.

      • clearVisited

        public void clearVisited(int li)
        Marks all nodes in the grid as unvisited for the layer indicated by li; this MUST be called before running PathFinder.find_path() again.
        Parameters:
        li - index for the layer to be cleared

      • clearAllVisited

        public void clearAllVisited()
        Calls clearVisited(int li) for all layers in GridLayers.

      • createTower

        public boolean createTower(int ti,
                  int li,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  boolean allLayers)
        Creates a new Tower object at location (x,y) with the properties of the Tower described by Tower towerIndex[ti].

        Marks element GridLayer.grid[y][x].is_passable as false for GridLayers[li]; if "allLayers" is true, then "is_passable" will be marked for all layers in GridLayers.

        GridLayers[0] is always marked (it is the main layer)

        Parameters:
        ti - identifies which tower should be built
        li - identifies which layer should be marked
        x -
        y -
        allLayers - indicates that all layers in GridLayers should be marked
        Returns:
        true for successfully built, and false for not

      • createUnit

        public boolean createUnit(int ui,
                 int x,
                 int y)
        Create a new unit specified by ui (unit_index) at location (x,y); assumes player resources have already been checked and will be augmented elsewhere.
        Parameters:
        ui - indicates what unit should be created
        x -
        y -

      • spawnEnemy

        public boolean spawnEnemy(int ei,
                 int x,
                 int y)
        Create a new Enemy specified by ei (enemy_index) at location (x,y).
        Parameters:
        ei - indicates what enemy should be created

      • removeTower

        public void removeTower(int li,
               int x,
               int y)
        Removes the tower located at (x,y) from the ObjectGrid's entity list.
